<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>"description"<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>: "Kent Carnie, the founding Curator of The Archives of Falconry, gives us an overview of the evolution of hoodmaking in America.This video is part of our virtual exhibit on The American Hood which you can find at falconry.org/virtual_exhibits/falconry_hoods/</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">Topics include: Falconry, Falconry Hoods, Hoodmaking, Karl Mollen, John Moran.",</p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_12898" id="stacks_in_12898" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-tr" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="hood_video_ll" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="full-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-overlay close-vis-never close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt; <span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-tr" id="close_stacks_in_12898"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="hood_video_ll"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info hood_video ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="hood_video" data-ll-name="My Video" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_2962" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_2962" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style lead theme_style lead text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>No single item so exemplifies the sport of falconry as the hood. The hood symbolizes both the rich artistry within the falconer community, along with the most practical of ancient tools needed to transport an old gamehawk or settle a freshly acquired passager.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;The rapid development and refinement of the hood in North America is the product of both departures from Old World standards and vibrant cross-fertilization among hoodmakers, professional and amateur. Explore the evolution of the “American Hood”.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_2969" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_2969" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryDivider_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;hr class="m-y-md foundry-divider-simple"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_2970" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_2970" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryHeader_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="text-xs-center"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;h3 class="theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>foundry-typeface-fourteen"&gt;How to Explore our Hood Exhibit&lt;/h3&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_2972" class="stacks_out" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_2972" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryColumns_stack" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>

<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>

<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override color_picker<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>color_picker<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-center foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style="text-align:center;"&gt;360° Interactive&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p&gt;&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_2994" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_2994" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-center foundry-typeface-one"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p style="text-align:center;"&gt;&lt;a href="https://falconry.catalogaccess.com/objects/704" target="_blank"&gt;Object ID 1992.4.1&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p&gt;&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;!-- Column Two --&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="foundry_column foundry_column_two<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>col-xs-12 col-md-6 col-lg-6"&gt;&lt;div class="inner_column_content"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_2973" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_2973" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override color_picker<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>color_picker<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>At the core of this exhibit are dozens of high-resolution 360° scans made as part of our ongoing digitization effort. These are just a sample of the hundreds of hoods in our collection, all of which we are scanning using this technology. You can explore every hood in this exhibit three ways. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;1)<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>View an &lt;strong&gt;Image Gallery&lt;/strong&gt; of stills from different angles.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;2)<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>Load the &lt;strong&gt;360° Interactive&lt;/strong&gt; spin which you can turn, tilt, and zoom. These interactive models are large files so they can take a while to load, even with a fast internet connection. To tilt the model down for a better view of the top, use your mouse or finger to "pull" it down significantly and it will switch angles.<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;3)<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>Click the &lt;strong&gt;Object ID&lt;/strong&gt; to open the collection record and explore deeper into the collection. <span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>

<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="container"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span> &lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_2996 " id="stacks_in_2996" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="Intro_example" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_2996"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="Intro_example"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1992_4_1_spin_intro ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="1992_4_1_spin_intro" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>

<p class="p1">&lt;!-- CONTENT --&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="1__status_quo_in_the_old_world_2" class="glide-section foundry-gn" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_3292" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_3292" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryHeader_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="text-xs-center"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;h2 class="white<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>foundry-typeface-fourteen"&gt;1. Status Quo in the Old World&lt;/h2&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_3044" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_3044" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style lead theme_style lead text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Early hoods across the Eurasian continent included a paper bag-style hood used by Japanese falconers for millennia; a stiff, closed-backed Indian hood requiring some force to affix; or a soft Arab-style hood with a draw-string — all indispensable aids to the management of hawks, falcons, and eagles alike.<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_3046" class="stacks_out" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_3046" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryContainer_stack" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="container"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_3049" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_3049" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryHeader_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="text-xs-center"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_3118 " id="stacks_in_3118" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="1996_64_1_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_3118"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="1996_64_1_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1996_64_1_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="1996_64_1_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_4677 " id="stacks_in_4677" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="2021_FIC_88_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_4677"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2021_FIC_88_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_FIC_88_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2021_FIC_88_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_4682 " id="stacks_in_4682" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="2021_FIC_88_gallery" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="full-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>allow-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="200"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">       </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-converted-space">      </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-converted-space">      </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-converted-space">      </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-converted-space">      </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-converted-space">      </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_4682"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2021_FIC_88_gallery"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_FIC_88_gallery-img1 ll-first" data-ll-trigger="2021_FIC_88_gallery-img1" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_FIC_88_gallery-img4" data-ll-trigger="2021_FIC_88_gallery-img4" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="2" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_FIC_88_gallery-img6" data-ll-trigger="2021_FIC_88_gallery-img6" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="3" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_FIC_88_gallery-img8" data-ll-trigger="2021_FIC_88_gallery-img8" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="4" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_FIC_88_gallery-img11" data-ll-trigger="2021_FIC_88_gallery-img11" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="5" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_FIC_88_gallery-bottom ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2021_FIC_88_gallery-bottom" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="6" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_3156" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_3156" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style lead theme_style lead text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Over centuries, European hoods transformed from their Arab antecedents to a carefully stitched three-piece hood, molded over a wood or metal form, and closed by braces. As reflected in the products of Valkenswaard's Mollen family, these rigid hoods retained their shape, and offered needed space around the falcon’s eyes. But unlike their Arab counterparts, they were heavy, with an unyielding, abrasive rectangular beak-opening through which a falcon could often not cast.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;By the 1920s and 30s the "standard" for American hoods was still the Dutch-style hood made by the Mollen family, however the supply ended following the death of Karel Theodore Mollen in 1935.&lt;br&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_5189" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_5189" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryColumns_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="row <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>equal"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;!-- Column One --&gt;</p>

<p class="p2"><br></p>

<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>&lt;div class="vertical-center-content"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_5192" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_5192" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryHeader_stack"&gt;</p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;h6 class="theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;Click on the maker's name below to open a virtual collection cabinet of their work.&lt;/h6&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>

<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_3566" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_3566" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_ivy2_stack"&gt;</p>

<p class="p1">&lt;ul id="stacks_in_3566_accordion" class="ghost"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;li&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_label"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span class="accordion_icon"&gt;&lt;i class="arrow_icon fa fa-chevron-right"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span style="color:#000000;"&gt;Karl T. Mollen&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_content" style="display: none; height: auto;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_3158" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_3158" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryContainer_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="container-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_3161" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_3161" class="stacks_in com_yourhead_stacks_two_columns_stack"&gt;&lt;div class="s3_row"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="s3_column s3_column_left"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_3167" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_3167" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-center foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-3167.jpg" alt="Karl T. Mollen" draggable="false" class="img-fluid "&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="s3_column s3_column_right"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_3165" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_3165" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Last survivor of the famed Mollen family of professional falcon trappers and hawk furniture makers of Valkenswaard in the Netherlands - died ca. 1936. Family for generations was associated with high-quality falconry (Loo Hawking Club), a reliable source of autumn-caught Peregrines (supplying Britain's Old Hawking Club), and for the epitome of Dutch-style hoods with which their name became synonymous.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_3169" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_3169" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryGrid_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="foundry_blocks_grid block-grid-xs-2 block-grid-sm-2 block-grid-md-3 block-grid-lg-4"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div&gt;</p>

&lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2002_15_24_gallery"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2002_15_24_gallery-img1 ll-first" data-ll-trigger="2002_15_24_gallery-img1" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2002_15_24_gallery-img4" data-ll-trigger="2002_15_24_gallery-img4" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="2" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2002_15_24_gallery-img6" data-ll-trigger="2002_15_24_gallery-img6" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="3" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2002_15_24_gallery-img8" data-ll-trigger="2002_15_24_gallery-img8" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="4" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2002_15_24_gallery-img11" data-ll-trigger="2002_15_24_gallery-img11" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="5" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2002_15_24_gallery-bottom ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2002_15_24_gallery-bottom" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="6" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_4358 " id="stacks_in_4358" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="2002_15_24_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_4358"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2002_15_24_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2002_15_24_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2002_15_24_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_4375"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="1994_47_18_gallery"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_47_18_gallery-img1 ll-first" data-ll-trigger="1994_47_18_gallery-img1" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_47_18_gallery-img4" data-ll-trigger="1994_47_18_gallery-img4" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="2" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_47_18_gallery-img6" data-ll-trigger="1994_47_18_gallery-img6" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="3" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_47_18_gallery-img8" data-ll-trigger="1994_47_18_gallery-img8" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="4" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_47_18_gallery-img11" data-ll-trigger="1994_47_18_gallery-img11" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="5" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_15_24_gallery-bottom ll-last" data-ll-trigger="1994_15_24_gallery-bottom" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="6" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; <p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_4367 " id="stacks_in_4367" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="1994_47_18_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_4367"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="1994_47_18_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_47_18_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="1994_47_18_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>

<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;!-- CONTENT --&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="2__early_american_craftsmen_1930_s___1940_s_3" class="glide-section foundry-gn" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_3301" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_3301" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryHeader_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="text-xs-center"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;h2 class="white<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>foundry-typeface-fourteen"&gt;2. Early American Craftsmen 1930’s – 1940’s&lt;/h2&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_4175" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_4175" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style lead theme_style lead text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>In the 1930s, a few Americans began to make and sell Dutch-style hoods based on European standards. Many retained the drawbacks of the heavy, stiff Mollen hoods yet without their refined craftmanship. The first of these was L. N. (Larry) Wight, a shop teacher who supplied fellow members of Philadelphia's Peregrine Club.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_3303" class="stacks_out" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_3303" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_4205" class="" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_4205" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryReveal_stack" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="stacks_in_4205_foundry_reveal fadeIn" data-wow-duration="1000ms" data-wow-offset="50" data-wow-delay="100ms" style="overflow: visible; visibility: visible; animation-duration: 1000ms; animation-delay: 100ms; animation-name: fadeIn;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_4171" class="" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_4171" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryColumns_stack" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="row <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>equal" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;!-- Column One --&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="foundry_column foundry_column_one col-xs-6" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;&lt;div class="inner_column_content" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_4177" class="" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_4177" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryZoom_stack" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="text-xs-center" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="zoom-wrap" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img class="zoom-image img-rounded" src="files/zoom_image-4177.jpg" data-action="zoom" alt="Hood pattern from Falconry: A Handbook for Hunters by Bill Russell"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="icon-indicator"&gt;&lt;i class="fa fa-search"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_3314" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_3314" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>From &lt;em&gt;Falconry: A Handbook for Hunters &lt;/em&gt;by Bill Russell.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="foundry_column foundry_column_two col-xs-6" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;&lt;div class="inner_column_content" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_4178" class="" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_4178" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryZoom_stack" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="icon-indicator"&gt;&lt;i class="fa fa-search"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>

<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_3321" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_3321" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left"&gt;</p>

<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_3304" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_3304" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style lead theme_style lead text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>New momentum emerged in 1940 with the publication of the first American falconry book, &lt;em&gt;Falconry: A Handbook for Hunters&lt;/em&gt; by Bill Russell. Russell’s book included a pattern for a modified (by the addition of Dutch-style braces) Indian hood, a style referred to as "Anglo-Indian." Such hood patterns had been depicted much earlier by Salvin &amp;amp; Brodrick (1855) in their &lt;em&gt;Falconry in the British Isles&lt;/em&gt;, however few British falconry publications were commonly available in the US.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;The style involved a simple one-piece construction without a block or “form” and offered a wide, smiling beak-opening that did not chafe and allowed the bird to cast. Aspiring American hoodmakers now had the necessary resources to launch their craft.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_4786" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_4786" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryColumns_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="row <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>equal"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>

<p class="p2"><br></p>

<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>&lt;div class="vertical-center-content"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_4790" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_4790" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryHeader_stack"&gt;</p>

<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;h6 class="theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;Click on the maker's name below to open a virtual collection cabinet of their work.&lt;/h6&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>

<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_3571" class="stacks_out" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_3571" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_ivy2_stack" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>

<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;i id="stacks_in_3571_open_all" class="fa fa-toggle-off stacks_in_3571_open_all_false"&gt;&lt;/i&gt; &lt;span id="stacks_in_3571_open_all_text" class=""&gt;Open all&lt;/span&gt; &lt;span id="stacks_in_3571_close_all_text" class="hide_toggle"&gt;Close all&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;ul id="stacks_in_3571_accordion" class="ghost" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;li&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_label stacks_in_3571_active stacks_in_3571_accordion_selectedarrow_icon"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span class="accordion_icon"&gt;&lt;i class="arrow_icon fa fa-chevron-down"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Russell "Luff" Meredith</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_content" style="display: block; height: auto;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8510" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8510" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_3426" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_3426" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-left foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-3426.jpg" alt="Russell Luff Meredith" draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8513" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8513" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Russell Luff Meredith is often acknowledged as "The Father of American Falconry". He was a leading proponent of the sport in its development in the early decades of the 20th Century. A source of both advice and information, his own practice of hawking in the field was limited by his many years in the eastern US, constraints of a military aviator's career, and a severe encounter with a propeller that side-lined active military duty for many years. Through those years he set an example of ethics and propriety in the sport. A long-time gadgeteer, his major contribution to hood-making was description of a pattern for a modified Anglo-Indian hood (&lt;em&gt;&lt;a href="https://falconry.org/resources/downloads/Meredith_1954.pdf" target="_blank"&gt;Falconry News and Notes&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/em&gt;&lt;a href="https://falconry.org/resources/downloads/Meredith_1954.pdf" target="_blank"&gt;;1(2):14-18&lt;/a&gt;). Others carried that patten forward into iterations that enhanced development of an American-style Dutch hood.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_3437" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_3437" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryGrid_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="foundry_blocks_grid block-grid-xs-2 block-grid-sm-2 block-grid-md-3 block-grid-lg-4"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_5380" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_5380" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-center foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-5380.jpg" alt="Russell Luff Meredith Falconry Hood" draggable="false" class="img-fluid "&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_5382" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_5382" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryColumns_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>

<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_label"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span class="accordion_icon"&gt;&lt;i class="arrow_icon fa fa-chevron-right"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Jim Fox</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_content" style="display: none; overflow: visible; height: auto;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8505" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8505" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8494" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8494" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-left foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-8494.jpg" alt="Jim Fox Hoodmaker" draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8508" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8508" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>A Washington DC falconer and close associate of Alva Nye. Most known for his goshawk-ing activities, Fox also trapped for many years on the ridges west of Washington. An exceptional craftsman, he was said to cope a hawk "better than God." As a hoodmaker, Fox was an early proponent of molding hoods made from Luff Meredith's Anglo-Indian 1954 hood pattern over Dutch style forms. The hoods so produced had a significant impact on subsequent Dutch-style hoods made by a newer generation of American hoodmakers.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_3395" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_3395" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryGrid_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="foundry_blocks_grid block-grid-xs-2 block-grid-sm-2 block-grid-md-3 block-grid-lg-4"&gt;</p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_5261 " id="stacks_in_5261" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="1994_27_1_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>

<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-8520.jpg" alt="Lawrence Wight" draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_3717" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_3717" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>A member of Philadelphia's Peregrine Club, Wight began making falconry equipment in the mid-1930’s when equipment was otherwise unavailable except from abroad. Although ostensibly modeled on imported Mollen hoods, Wight's standard of workmanship failed to live up to the quality of the Dutch originals. He continued his efforts for many decades but he was soon surpassed by a growing corps of American craftsmen.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_3720" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_3720" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryGrid_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="foundry_blocks_grid block-grid-xs-2 block-grid-sm-2 block-grid-md-3 block-grid-lg-4"&gt;</p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_5114"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="1999_57_1_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1999_57_1_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="1999_57_1_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_3684" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_3684" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>A student and friend of Robert Stabler, Larry Zuk was a serious, dedicated falconer. In his college days in Pennsylvania he attempted to copy Mollen hoods in the hands of local falconers but seemingly only pursued that endeavor for his own needs and did not follow it subsequently. Following naval service in California during World War II, he drove cross country visiting numerous falconers en route. Particularly struck by pheasant numbers outside Denver he returned and settled there, actively pursuing game hawking with bell maker Pete Asborno.&lt;br&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_3686" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_3686" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryGrid_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="foundry_blocks_grid block-grid-xs-2 block-grid-sm-2 block-grid-md-3 block-grid-lg-4"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div&gt;</p>

<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;h2 class="white<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>foundry-typeface-fourteen"&gt;3. Emerging Artisans &amp;amp; Refining Patterns 1950’s – 1960’s&lt;/h2&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_3968" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_3968" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_4009" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_4009" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-center foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
