<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_3969" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_3969" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style lead theme_style lead text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Based on contacts developed during WWII, U.S. falconers began to obtain well-made hoods from German maker Otto Kals, and particularly fine Dutch-style hoods made in France by Henri Ondet - both influencing several Americans. Lou Woyce, Minard Stevens, and Bob Widmeier emulated their favorite European mentors, and on their heels, the exceptional craftsman Brian McDonald emerged as the leading commercial hoodmaker in the U.S. Known for his fine Dutch hoods, McDonald also made exquisitely tooled Anglo-Indian hoods.&lt;br&gt; &lt;br&gt;In January 1954, Luff Meredith published a pattern in &lt;em&gt;&lt;a href="https://falconry.org/resources/downloads/Meredith_1954.pdf" target="_blank"&gt;Falconry News and Notes&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/em&gt;, for a further-modified molded Anglo-Indian hood; one with an essentially square (flat) bottom. Soon after, Widmeier &lt;a href="https://falconry.org/resources/downloads/Widmeier-1954.pdf" target="_blank"&gt;published a detailed article&lt;/a&gt; describing how to make a 3-piece Dutch hood, following lessons from his friend, California falconer Minard Stevens. In 1959, &lt;em&gt;Falconry News and Notes&lt;/em&gt; reprinted, the Dutch falconer &lt;a href="https://falconry.org/resources/downloads/Slijper-1959.pdf" target="_blank"&gt;H. J. Slijper’s article&lt;/a&gt; describing a tailor's "canon" for an Anglo-Indian hood - a means whereby various sizes of a basic hood pattern could be produced by application of a mathematical formula. By the 1960’s American falconers had tried and true patterns and instructions. The craft was poised to blossom.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_5651" class="stacks_out" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_5651" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_ivy2_stack" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="show_all_alignment"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;i id="stacks_in_5651_open_all" class="fa fa-toggle-off stacks_in_5651_open_all_false"&gt;&lt;/i&gt; &lt;span id="stacks_in_5651_open_all_text" class=""&gt;Open all&lt;/span&gt; &lt;span id="stacks_in_5651_close_all_text" class="hide_toggle"&gt;Close all&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;ul id="stacks_in_5651_accordion" class="ghost" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;li style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_label"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span class="accordion_icon"&gt;&lt;i class="arrow_icon fa fa-chevron-right"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span style="color:#000000;"&gt;Otto Kals&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_content" style="display: none; overflow: visible; height: auto;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8528" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8528" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8532" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8532" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-left foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-8532.jpg" alt="Otto Kals Hoodmaker" draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8529" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8529" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>A German professional falconer closely associated with Renz Waller, Kals was first introduced to American falconry circles when referenced in Bill Russell's 1940 falconry book as a source of falconry furniture. His hood pattern and standards highly influenced Minard Stevens, resulting in the first quality Dutch hoods made in N. America. Stevens and several other American falconers purchased Kals' fine pencil drawings helping him survive the vicissitudes in Germany following World War II.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_5936" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_5936" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryGrid_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="foundry_blocks_grid block-grid-xs-2 block-grid-sm-2 block-grid-md-3 block-grid-lg-4"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_5939" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_5939" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-center foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>

<p class="p2"><br></p>

<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_5941" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_5941" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryColumns_stack"&gt;</p>

<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-center foundry-typeface-one"&gt;</p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8469" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8469" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-center foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_8886 " id="stacks_in_8886" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="1991_18_14_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>

<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8535" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8535" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Brian McDonald was a master craftsman, accomplished in a variety of media. Close to Washington DC falconer T. Halter ("Dusty") Cunningham, the two trapped Peregrines together on the beaches of Assateague Island in the years following World War II. From those experiences the two came up with the American version of a leather, noose-bearing harness that has been a staple in American trapping ever since. With his skills, McDonald turned to hood-making and became America's first national-level commercial hoodmaker, offering both Anglo-Indian hoods and the modernized Dutch-style, made over forms of his own making. Along with Lou Woyce, he is credited with advancing the “smiling” beak opening in Dutch-style hoods.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_6036" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_6036" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryGrid_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="foundry_blocks_grid block-grid-xs-2 block-grid-sm-2 block-grid-md-3 block-grid-lg-4"&gt;</p>

&lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="1991_5_33_gallery"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1991_5_33_gallery-img1 ll-first" data-ll-trigger="1991_5_33_gallery-img1" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1991_5_33_gallery-img4" data-ll-trigger="1991_5_33_gallery-img4" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="2" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1991_5_33_gallery-img6" data-ll-trigger="1991_5_33_gallery-img6" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="3" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1991_5_33_gallery-img8" data-ll-trigger="1991_5_33_gallery-img8" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="4" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1991_5_33_gallery-img11" data-ll-trigger="1991_5_33_gallery-img11" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="5" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1991_5_33_gallery-bottom ll-last" data-ll-trigger="1991_5_33_gallery-bottom" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="6" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_9116 " id="stacks_in_9116" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="1991_5_33_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_9116"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="1991_5_33_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1991_5_33_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="1991_5_33_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/li&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;li style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_label"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span class="accordion_icon"&gt;&lt;i class="arrow_icon fa fa-chevron-right"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span style="color:#000000;"&gt;Andre-Henri Ondet&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_content" style="display: none; overflow: visible; height: auto;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8540" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8540" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8544" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8544" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-left foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-8544.jpg" alt="Andre-Henri Ondet falconry hoodmaker" draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8541" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8541" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>A French professional saddler, not a falconer, Ondet was encouraged my members of the French falconry community and became recognized as a maker of high-quality Dutch-style hoods. Ondet was introduced into American falconry circles through his association with Philadelphia falconer Cornelius ("Corny") McFadden during the latter's European service in World War II. McFadden inspired hoodmakers including Bob Widmeier, Doug Pineo and Lou Woyce, with examples of Ondet hoods.<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>Their standard had a recognizable effect on the quality of hoods produced in the United States in subsequent years.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_5961" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_5961" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryGrid_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="foundry_blocks_grid block-grid-xs-2 block-grid-sm-2 block-grid-md-3 block-grid-lg-4"&gt;</p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_9785"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="1992_65_4_gallery"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1992_65_4_gallery-img1 ll-first" data-ll-trigger="1992_65_4_gallery-img1" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1992_65_4_gallery-img4" data-ll-trigger="1992_65_4_gallery-img4" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="2" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1992_65_4_gallery-img6" data-ll-trigger="1992_65_4_gallery-img6" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="3" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1992_65_4_gallery-img8" data-ll-trigger="1992_65_4_gallery-img8" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="4" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1992_65_4_gallery-img11" data-ll-trigger="1992_65_4_gallery-img11" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="5" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1992_65_4_gallery-bottom ll-last" data-ll-trigger="1992_65_4_gallery-bottom" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="6" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_9798 " id="stacks_in_9798" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="1992_65_4_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_9798"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="1992_65_4_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1992_65_4_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="1992_65_4_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/li&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;li style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_label"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span class="accordion_icon"&gt;&lt;i class="arrow_icon fa fa-chevron-right"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span style="color:#000000;"&gt;H.J. Slijper&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_content" style="display: none; overflow: visible; height: auto;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8546" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8546" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8550" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8550" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-left foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-8550.jpg" alt="H.J. Slijper falconry hoodmaker" draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8706" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8706" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>H. J. Slijper was a Dutch artist and hoodmaker who came to the attention of Americans when he published a detailed article proposing a tailor's "canon"-type formula by which Anglo-Indian style hoods could be made to fit utilizing a basic measurement of the breadth of the hawk's head.<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>While not uniformly consistent, hoods made using his formula fit well and were used in the U.S. for several years following appearance of the article.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_5770" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_5770" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryGrid_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="foundry_blocks_grid block-grid-xs-2 block-grid-sm-2 block-grid-md-3 block-grid-lg-4"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_5773" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_5773" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-center foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>

<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>

<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_5784" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_5784" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-center foundry-typeface-one"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;a href="https://falconry.catalogaccess.com/objects/5977" target="_blank"&gt;Object ID 2013.16.1&lt;/a&gt;</p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_12582 " id="stacks_in_12582" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="2013_16_1_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_12582"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2013_16_1_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2013_16_1_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2013_16_1_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/li&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;li style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_label stacks_in_5651_active stacks_in_5651_accordion_selectedarrow_icon"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span class="accordion_icon"&gt;&lt;i class="arrow_icon fa fa-chevron-down"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span style="color:#000000;"&gt;Minard Stevens&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_content" style="display: block; overflow: visible; height: auto;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8552" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8552" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8556" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8556" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-left foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-8556.jpg" alt="Minard Stevens falconry hoodmaker" draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8553" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8553" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Texas-born California falconer practicing until the advent of World War II, Stevens hawked during an era when most were holding birds more than hawking. Both before and following WWII, Stevens became an accomplished maker of fine Dutch-style hoods, little recognized however, due both to his retiring nature and higher pricing ($15) compared to the competition then under $10. Later in his career, falconers were impressed by his hoods after his wife Gladys ("Dirk") carved intricately beautiful designs on their exteriors.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_5986" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_5986" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryGrid_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="foundry_blocks_grid block-grid-xs-2 block-grid-sm-2 block-grid-md-3 block-grid-lg-4"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_5989" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_5989" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-center foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>

<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>

<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_5991" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_5991" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryColumns_stack"&gt;</p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;!-- Column Two --&gt;</p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_9836 " id="stacks_in_9836" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="1991_18_15_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_9836"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="1991_18_15_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1991_18_15_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="1991_18_15_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_9889 " id="stacks_in_9889" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="2021_FIC_73_gallery" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="full-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>allow-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="200"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">       </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-converted-space">      </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-converted-space">      </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-converted-space">      </span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_9889"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2021_FIC_73_gallery"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_FIC_73_gallery-img1 ll-first" data-ll-trigger="2021_FIC_73_gallery-img1" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_FIC_73_gallery-img4" data-ll-trigger="2021_FIC_73_gallery-img4" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="2" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_FIC_73_gallery-img6" data-ll-trigger="2021_FIC_73_gallery-img6" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="3" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_FIC_73_gallery-img8" data-ll-trigger="2021_FIC_73_gallery-img8" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="4" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_FIC_73_gallery-img11" data-ll-trigger="2021_FIC_73_gallery-img11" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="5" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_FIC_73_gallery-bottom ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2021_FIC_73_gallery-bottom" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="6" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_9902 " id="stacks_in_9902" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="2021_FIC_73_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_9902"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2021_FIC_73_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_FIC_73_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2021_FIC_73_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/li&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;li style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_label"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span class="accordion_icon"&gt;&lt;i class="arrow_icon fa fa-chevron-right"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span style="color:#000000;"&gt;June Woodford&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_content" style="display: none; overflow: visible; height: auto;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8558" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8558" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8562" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8562" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-left foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-8562.jpg" alt="June Woodford falconry hoodmaker" draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8559" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8559" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>June was a British veterinarian whose interest in hoodmaking was sparked by her falconer-spouse who was also the Secretary of the British Falconers' Club. Her hoods were particularly well made and of stylish appearance, yet retained the heavy stiffness of the classic Dutch hood together with its rectangular beak-opening. Her attendance at NAFA's 1963 field meet introduced her hoods to an American clientele. However American falconers were more and more drawn to locally produced, lighter-weight hoods featuring the new "smiling" beak-opening.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_6061" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_6061" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryGrid_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="foundry_blocks_grid block-grid-xs-2 block-grid-sm-2 block-grid-md-3 block-grid-lg-4"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_6064" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_6064" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-center foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>

<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>

<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>

<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>

<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>

&lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="1994_48_1_gallery"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_48_1_gallery-img1 ll-first" data-ll-trigger="1994_48_1_gallery-img1" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_48_1_gallery-img4" data-ll-trigger="1994_48_1_gallery-img4" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="2" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_48_1_gallery-img6" data-ll-trigger="1994_48_1_gallery-img6" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="3" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_48_1_gallery-img8" data-ll-trigger="1994_48_1_gallery-img8" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="4" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_48_1_gallery-img11" data-ll-trigger="1994_48_1_gallery-img11" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="5" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_48_1_gallery-bottom ll-last" data-ll-trigger="1994_48_1_gallery-bottom" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="6" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; <p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_9941 " id="stacks_in_9941" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="1994_48_1_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_9941"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="1994_48_1_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_48_1_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="1994_48_1_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_9978"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="1994_98_1_gallery"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_98_1_gallery-img1 ll-first" data-ll-trigger="1994_98_1_gallery-img1" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_98_1_gallery-img4" data-ll-trigger="1994_98_1_gallery-img4" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="2" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_98_1_gallery-img6" data-ll-trigger="1994_98_1_gallery-img6" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="3" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_98_1_gallery-img8" data-ll-trigger="1994_98_1_gallery-img8" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="4" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_98_1_gallery-img11" data-ll-trigger="1994_98_1_gallery-img11" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="5" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_98_1_gallery-bottom ll-last" data-ll-trigger="1994_98_1_gallery-bottom" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="6" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; <p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_9990 " id="stacks_in_9990" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="1994_98_1_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_9990"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="1994_98_1_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_98_1_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="1994_98_1_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>

<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>

<p class="p1">&lt;/li&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;li style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_label"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span class="accordion_icon"&gt;&lt;i class="arrow_icon fa fa-chevron-right"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span style="color:#000000;"&gt;Lou Woyce&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_content" style="display: none; overflow: visible; height: auto;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8564" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8564" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8568" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8568" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-left foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-8568.jpg" alt="Lou Woyce falconry hoodmaker" draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8565" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8565" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>A Maryland falconer, Lou Woyce grew up in falconry as one of Corny McFadden's disciples. Among other talents, Lou was assigned (by McFadden) as a hoodmaker for the group. With his own considerable skills, and using as examples Ondet hoods supplied by McFadden, Lou became one of a small group making excellent Dutch-style hoods, continuing to improve over the years. He and Brian McDonald, led the development of a bell-shaped ("smiling") beak opening, designed to fit the contours of the falcon's beak, thus making for a far-more comfortable (and acceptable –&amp;nbsp;to the bird) hood.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>

<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="foundry_blocks_grid block-grid-xs-2 block-grid-sm-2 block-grid-md-3 block-grid-lg-4"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div&gt;</p>
