<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_10104 " id="stacks_in_10104" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="2021_2_42_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_10104"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2021_2_42_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_2_42_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2021_2_42_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_10066 " id="stacks_in_10066" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="2021_2_41_gallery" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="full-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>allow-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="200"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">       </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-converted-space">      </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-converted-space">      </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-converted-space">      </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-converted-space">      </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-converted-space">      </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_10066"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2021_2_41_gallery"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_2_41_gallery-img1 ll-first" data-ll-trigger="2021_2_41_gallery-img1" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_2_41_gallery-img4" data-ll-trigger="2021_2_41_gallery-img4" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="2" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_2_41_gallery-img6" data-ll-trigger="2021_2_41_gallery-img6" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="3" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_2_41_gallery-img8" data-ll-trigger="2021_2_41_gallery-img8" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="4" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_2_41_gallery-img11" data-ll-trigger="2021_2_41_gallery-img11" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="5" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_2_41_gallery-bottom ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2021_2_41_gallery-bottom" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="6" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_10078 " id="stacks_in_10078" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="2021_2_41_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_10078"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2021_2_41_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_2_41_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2021_2_41_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>

<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;!-- CONTENT --&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="4__the_american_renaissance__1970_s___1990_s_5" class="glide-section foundry-gn" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_6081" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_6081" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryHeader_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="text-xs-center"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;h2 class="white<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>foundry-typeface-fourteen"&gt;4. The American Renaissance: 1970’s – 1990’s&lt;/h2&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_6084" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_6084" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_6088" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_6088" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-center foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-6088.jpg" alt="falconry hoods in The Archive" draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_6085" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_6085" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style lead theme_style lead text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>By the mid-1970s Brian McDonald had slowed down his hood-making and several talented prospects emerged including Bob Martin and Doug Pineo. Influenced by Ondet hoods and Lou Woyce, Pineo began crafting excellent Dutch-style hoods employing the smiling beak opening with great skill. Pineo soon became prolific and, still active today, would achieve the longest tenure of any commercial hoodmaker in North America.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;In this same period California falconer John Moran established new standards with his refined Dutch-style hoods. Moran was strongly influenced by Bob Martin, and although highly acclaimed for the art decorating the side panels of his hoods, the real attractions to Moran's hoods were their excellent fit and the high standard of craftsmanship. Not readily recognized, Moran's early Dutch hoods were made on the Meredith pattern noted above.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;Moran's craftsmanship was infectious, and a flurry of high-quality hoods began to appear by such competent craftsmen as Gene Johnson and Dave Current. Gene's artistic abilities extended far beyond his hoods, including painting, fine leatherwork, and even knife-making. Dave Current set an example (as well as a basic hood shape) that was then followed by many upcoming hood-makers.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_6090" class="stacks_out" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_6090" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_ivy2_stack" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="show_all_alignment"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;i id="stacks_in_6090_open_all" class="fa fa-toggle-off stacks_in_6090_open_all_false"&gt;&lt;/i&gt; &lt;span id="stacks_in_6090_open_all_text" class=""&gt;Open all&lt;/span&gt; &lt;span id="stacks_in_6090_close_all_text" class="hide_toggle"&gt;Close all&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;ul id="stacks_in_6090_accordion" class="ghost" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;li style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_label"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span class="accordion_icon"&gt;&lt;i class="arrow_icon fa fa-chevron-right"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span style="color:#000000;"&gt;Dave Current&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_content" style="display: none; overflow: visible; height: auto;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8570" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8570" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8574" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8574" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-left foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-8574.jpg" alt="Dave Current falconry hoodmaker" draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8708" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8708" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>An Illinois falconer, Current was a close friend of Ed Fitch who he accompanied on hawking excursions to Nebraska as American falconers began to seek high quality quarry further from home. Although lesser known among contemporary hoodmakers, his finely made Dutch-style hood inspired many.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_6189" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_6189" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryGrid_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="foundry_blocks_grid block-grid-xs-2 block-grid-sm-2 block-grid-md-3 block-grid-lg-4"&gt;</p>

<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8577" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8577" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Gene Johnson was a falconer, artist, and falconry equipment maker of rare talent. He graduated from Ohio State University in 1970 with a degree in Wildlife Management and served in the United States Air Force as an ICBM Missile Launch Control Officer during the Vietnam War. At Wichita State University and Kent State University, he studied Fine and Graphic Arts, Arabic, Sculpture, Jewelry Making and Metal Sculpture in the form of knife making. Gene was recognized as a premier hood-maker in the eastern side of the US in the late 60’s and 70’s then later moved to Colorado. He is recognized as the first U.S. hood-maker to incorporate the Arab accordion-style back in a 3-piece Dutch-style hood. Seeking to capitalize on a potential Arab market he made use of Arabic script in advertising. The quality of his hoods attracted the affirmative attention of Sheikh Zayed Bin-Sultan al Nahyan as early as 1976 at the first International Conference on Falconry and Conservation hosted by that U.A.E. leader. Many of his later hoods had a maker’s mark of a falcon above the beak opening. &lt;br&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_6166" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_6166" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryGrid_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="foundry_blocks_grid block-grid-xs-2 block-grid-sm-2 block-grid-md-3 block-grid-lg-4"&gt;</p>

&lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="1994_101_1_gallery"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_101_1_gallery-img1 ll-first" data-ll-trigger="1994_101_1_gallery-img1" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_101_1_gallery-img4" data-ll-trigger="1994_101_1_gallery-img4" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="2" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_101_1_gallery-img6" data-ll-trigger="1994_101_1_gallery-img6" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="3" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_101_1_gallery-img8" data-ll-trigger="1994_101_1_gallery-img8" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="4" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_101_1_gallery-img11" data-ll-trigger="1994_101_1_gallery-img11" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="5" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_101_1_gallery-bottom ll-last" data-ll-trigger="1994_101_1_gallery-bottom" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="6" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_10292 " id="stacks_in_10292" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="1994_101_1_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_10292"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="1994_101_1_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_101_1_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="1994_101_1_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/li&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;li style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_label stacks_in_6090_active stacks_in_6090_accordion_selectedarrow_icon"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span class="accordion_icon"&gt;&lt;i class="arrow_icon fa fa-chevron-down"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span style="color:#000000;"&gt;Bob Martin&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_content" style="display: block; overflow: visible; height: auto;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8582" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8582" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8586" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8586" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-left foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-8586.jpg" alt="Bob Martin falconry hoodmaker" draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8583" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8583" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>A California falconer, Martin was of considerable skill both with a hawk in the field and at his hoodmakers bench. In Southern California's aero-space industry he had learned the intricacies needed to shape the wooden block for his hoods. Coming in the aftermath of McDonald hoods, some considered Martin hoods heavier, which they were to a degree, but their fit was exemplary. His patterns and blocks were heavily influenced by Ondet. Martin's output went mostly to local friends, never receiving the notoriety they deserved.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>

<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="foundry_blocks_grid block-grid-xs-2 block-grid-sm-2 block-grid-md-3 block-grid-lg-4"&gt;</p>

<p class="p1">&lt;li style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_label"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span class="accordion_icon"&gt;&lt;i class="arrow_icon fa fa-chevron-right"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span style="color:#000000;"&gt;John Moran&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_content" style="display: none; overflow: visible; height: auto;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8588" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8588" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8592" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8592" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-left foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-8592.jpg" alt="John Moran falconry hoodmaker" draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8589" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8589" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Considered an inspiration by many contemporary hoodmakers, Moran was known for both the exceptional fit of his field hoods and an unparalleled level of artistry displayed in show pieces. Moran grew up in Pennsylvania where he received some formal art training before moving to California. He started making Anglo-Indian hoods over a block but was introduced to making the 3-piece Dutch-style hood by California falconer, and hoodmaker, Bob Martin. Later he moved to Colorado where he was influenced by Jack Stoddart. Before long, Moran began to refine his patterns and achieved a high reputation of exceptional fitting hoods. While some decorative hoods easily exhibit his artistry, others have concealed miniature paintings in the inside eye-panels.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>

<p class="p2"><br></p>

<p class="p1">&lt;li style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_label"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span class="accordion_icon"&gt;&lt;i class="arrow_icon fa fa-chevron-right"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span style="color:#000000;"&gt;Doug Pineo&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_content" style="display: none; overflow: visible; height: auto;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8594" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8594" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8598" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8598" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-left foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-8598.jpg" alt="Doug Pineo falconry hoodmaker " draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8595" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8595" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Doug Pineo is the longest running falconry equipment vendor in North America. Doug also worked concurrently as a full-time wildlife biologist/ecologist for Washington Department of Fisheries and Wildlife (retired). He is an active supporter and volunteer for many conservation groups and falconry organizations. Doug published his first falconry equipment price list in 1968, and while he is known for the quality of his equipment generally, his Dutch hoods are widely regarded in North America and internationally, for their quality and fit.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_6120" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_6120" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryGrid_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="foundry_blocks_grid block-grid-xs-2 block-grid-sm-2 block-grid-md-3 block-grid-lg-4"&gt;</p>

&lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="1994_34_2_gallery"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_34_2_gallery-img1 ll-first" data-ll-trigger="1994_34_2_gallery-img1" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_34_2_gallery-img4" data-ll-trigger="1994_34_2_gallery-img4" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="2" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_34_2_gallery-img6" data-ll-trigger="1994_34_2_gallery-img6" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="3" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_34_2_gallery-img8" data-ll-trigger="1994_34_2_gallery-img8" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="4" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_34_2_gallery-img11" data-ll-trigger="1994_34_2_gallery-img11" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="5" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_34_2_gallery-bottom ll-last" data-ll-trigger="1994_34_2_gallery-bottom" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="6" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; <p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_11249 " id="stacks_in_11249" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="1994_34_2_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>

&lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2016_1_1_gallery"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2016_1_1_gallery-img1 ll-first" data-ll-trigger="2016_1_1_gallery-img1" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2016_1_1_gallery-img4" data-ll-trigger="2016_1_1_gallery-img4" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="2" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2016_1_1_gallery-img6" data-ll-trigger="2016_1_1_gallery-img6" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="3" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2016_1_1_gallery-img8" data-ll-trigger="2016_1_1_gallery-img8" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="4" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2016_1_1_gallery-img11" data-ll-trigger="2016_1_1_gallery-img11" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="5" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2016_1_1_gallery-bottom ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2016_1_1_gallery-bottom" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="6" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_11217 " id="stacks_in_11217" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="2016_1_1_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_11217"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2016_1_1_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2016_1_1_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2016_1_1_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/li&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/ul&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_6855" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_6855" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style lead theme_style lead text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fourteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>By the 1980’s and 90’s, a new assemble of craftsmen emerged including Chad Cyrus, Gerald Geiger, Ray Gilbertson, Robert Helsom, Tom Maechtle, Jim Nelson, Ron Rollins, Clayton Smith, Steve Tait, Pete Watzke and more.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;Several other highly talented hoodmakers devoted their artistry to meeting their own needs, and that of hawking friends, rather than commit to all-out commercial production, including Jim Ince, Rob Coleman, Bob Berry, and Art Tawatari, to name a few.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;By the mid-1980s the purchased Dutch hood appeared to have surpassed the self-made Anglo-Indian as the hood of choice for virtually all falconers who could afford them. By the late 1990’s falconers had a large selection of fine American hoodmakers from whom to choose.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_6857" class="stacks_out" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_6857" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_ivy2_stack" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="show_all_alignment"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;i id="stacks_in_6857_open_all" class="fa fa-toggle-off stacks_in_6857_open_all_false"&gt;&lt;/i&gt; &lt;span id="stacks_in_6857_open_all_text" class=""&gt;Open all&lt;/span&gt; &lt;span id="stacks_in_6857_close_all_text" class="hide_toggle"&gt;Close all&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;ul id="stacks_in_6857_accordion" class="ghost" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;li style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_label"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span class="accordion_icon"&gt;&lt;i class="arrow_icon fa fa-chevron-right"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Bob Berry</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_content" style="display: none; overflow: visible; height: auto;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8600" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8600" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8604" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8604" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-left foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-8604.jpg" alt="Bob Berry falconry hoodmaker" draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8601" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8601" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Bob Berry is a raptor conservationist and cofounder of the The Peregrine Fund. He is also known for his role developing falconry telemetry. As a hoodmaker, he initially received instruction from Lou Woyce and then later Chad Cyrus. Never delving into commercial production, his hoods were primarily intended for personal use or given to friends.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_7838" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_7838" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryGrid_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="foundry_blocks_grid block-grid-xs-2 block-grid-sm-2 block-grid-md-3 block-grid-lg-4"&gt;</p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_11314 " id="stacks_in_11314" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="1996_112_1_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_11314"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="1996_112_1_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1996_112_1_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="1996_112_1_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/li&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;li style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_label"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span class="accordion_icon"&gt;&lt;i class="arrow_icon fa fa-chevron-right"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Rob Coleman</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_content" style="display: none; overflow: visible; height: auto;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8606" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8606" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>

<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8610" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8610" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-left foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>

<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-8610.jpg" alt="Rob Coleman falconry hoodmaker" draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8607" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8607" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>The son of a California falconer, the late Rob Coleman showed tremendous artistic talent at an early age. Coleman’s paintings are prized by falconers and while he never made hoods commercially, and produced modest numbers, his elegant hoods reflected his natural artistic ability.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_7864" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_7864" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryGrid_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_12468"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2014_1_1_gallery"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2014_1_1_gallery-img1 ll-first" data-ll-trigger="2014_1_1_gallery-img1" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2014_1_1_gallery-img4" data-ll-trigger="2014_1_1_gallery-img4" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="2" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2014_1_1_gallery-img6" data-ll-trigger="2014_1_1_gallery-img6" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="3" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2014_1_1_gallery-img8" data-ll-trigger="2014_1_1_gallery-img8" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="4" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2014_1_1_gallery-img11" data-ll-trigger="2014_1_1_gallery-img11" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="5" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2014_1_1_gallery-bottom ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2014_1_1_gallery-bottom" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="6" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_12480 " id="stacks_in_12480" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="2014_1_1_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_12480"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2014_1_1_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2014_1_1_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2014_1_1_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/li&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;li style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_label"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span class="accordion_icon"&gt;&lt;i class="arrow_icon fa fa-chevron-right"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span style="color:#000000;"&gt;Chad Cyrus&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_content" style="display: none; overflow: visible; height: auto;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8612" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8612" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8616" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8616" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-left foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-8616.jpg" alt="Chad Cyrus falconry hoodmaker" draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8613" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8613" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>A native of Montana, the late Chad Cyrus advanced as a falconer under the influence of Pete Widener, the Mutch brothers, and Dan Konkel. He began making hoods as a teenager and was later mentored by Gerald Geiger. Cyrus sculpted his own blocks without copying others and sold hoods commercially for many years until his untimely death in 2011.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_6979" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_6979" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryGrid_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="foundry_blocks_grid block-grid-xs-2 block-grid-sm-2 block-grid-md-3 block-grid-lg-4"&gt;</p>

<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-center foundry-typeface-one"&gt;</p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_label"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span class="accordion_icon"&gt;&lt;i class="arrow_icon fa fa-chevron-right"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span style="color:#000000;"&gt;Gerald Geiger&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_content" style="display: none; overflow: visible; height: auto;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8618" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8618" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8622" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8622" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-left foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-8622.jpg" alt="Gerald Geiger falconry hoodmaker" draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8619" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8619" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Gerald Geiger was a born in the prairie region of Glendive, Montana but relocated to the Missoula area where he became a falconer. He worked in the railroad industry while flying passage falcons and goshawks. He later relocated to the “Hi-line” and expanded his breeding project, focusing on Peale’s peregrines and occasionally gyr-hybrids. Mastering many dimensions of falconry, Geiger is known for his gamehawking acumen, fine setters, peregrines, and excellent falconry equipment including elegant hoods. Although Geiger never delved into significant commercial production, he mentored hood-makers such as Chad Cyrus and Ray Gilbertson.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
