&lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="1994_4_3_gallery"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_4_3_gallery-img1 ll-first" data-ll-trigger="1994_4_3_gallery-img1" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_4_3_gallery-img4" data-ll-trigger="1994_4_3_gallery-img4" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="2" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_4_3_gallery-img6" data-ll-trigger="1994_4_3_gallery-img6" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="3" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_4_3_gallery-img8" data-ll-trigger="1994_4_3_gallery-img8" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="4" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_4_3_gallery-img11" data-ll-trigger="1994_4_3_gallery-img11" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="5" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_4_3_gallery-bottom ll-last" data-ll-trigger="1994_4_3_gallery-bottom" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="6" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_11454 " id="stacks_in_11454" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="1994_4_3_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_11454"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="1994_4_3_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 1994_4_3_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="1994_4_3_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/li&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;li style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_label"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span class="accordion_icon"&gt;&lt;i class="arrow_icon fa fa-chevron-right"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span style="color:#000000;"&gt;Ray Gilbertson&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_content" style="display: none; overflow: visible; height: auto;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8624" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8624" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8628" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8628" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-left foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-8628.jpg" alt="Ray Gilbertson falconry hoodmaker" draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8625" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8625" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Gilbertson entered falconry in the Missoula area under the influence of falconers such as Pete Widener and Gerald Geiger, the later mentored him as a hoodmaker. Along with fellow Montana falconer-hoodmaker Clayton Smith, Gilbertson’s hoods reflect an extremely high standard of craftsmanship.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>

<p class="p2"><br></p>

&lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2017_6_1_gallery"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2017_6_1_gallery-img1 ll-first" data-ll-trigger="2017_6_1_gallery-img1" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2017_6_1_gallery-img4" data-ll-trigger="2017_6_1_gallery-img4" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="2" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2017_6_1_gallery-img6" data-ll-trigger="2017_6_1_gallery-img6" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="3" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2017_6_1_gallery-img8" data-ll-trigger="2017_6_1_gallery-img8" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="4" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2017_6_1_gallery-img11" data-ll-trigger="2017_6_1_gallery-img11" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="5" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2017_6_1_gallery-bottom ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2017_6_1_gallery-bottom" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="6" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_11582 " id="stacks_in_11582" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="2017_6_1_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_11582"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2017_6_1_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2017_6_1_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2017_6_1_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/li&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;li style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_label"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span class="accordion_icon"&gt;&lt;i class="arrow_icon fa fa-chevron-right"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Jim Ince</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_content" style="display: none; overflow: visible; height: auto;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8638" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8638" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8642" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8642" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-left foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-8642.jpg" alt="Jim Ince falconry hoodmaker" draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8639" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8639" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>A highly skilled falconer, hoodmaker, bell-maker, and overall master-craftsmen, Ince was influenced by hoodmakers Brian McDonald and Bob Martin. He produces a lightweight finely made 3-piece Dutch-style hood with exacting stiches and nicely shaped beak opening. Ince primarily produces hoods for personal use and friends.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_7979" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_7979" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryGrid_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="foundry_blocks_grid block-grid-xs-2 block-grid-sm-2 block-grid-md-3 block-grid-lg-4"&gt;</p>

<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_7994" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_7994" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>

<p class="p1">&lt;/li&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;li style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_label"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span class="accordion_icon"&gt;&lt;i class="arrow_icon fa fa-chevron-right"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span style="color:#000000;"&gt;Tom Maechtle&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_content" style="display: none; overflow: visible; height: auto;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8644" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8644" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8648" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8648" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-left foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-8648.jpg" alt="Tom Maechtle falconry hoodmaker" draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8645" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8645" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Tom Maechtle was a wildlife professional who worked as a field biologist for The Peregrine Fund - a career that began as a teenager. He eventually gravitated to hoodmaking while surrounded by numerous experienced falconer-biologists who gave him tips and feedback. Maechtle produced hoods commercially for several years. He acknowledged instruction from Dave Current as an important factor in his development.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>

<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="foundry_blocks_grid block-grid-xs-2 block-grid-sm-2 block-grid-md-3 block-grid-lg-4"&gt;</p>

&lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2021_2_36_gallery"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_2_36_gallery-img1 ll-first" data-ll-trigger="2021_2_36_gallery-img1" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_2_36_gallery-img4" data-ll-trigger="2021_2_36_gallery-img4" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="2" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_2_36_gallery-img6" data-ll-trigger="2021_2_36_gallery-img6" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="3" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_2_36_gallery-img8" data-ll-trigger="2021_2_36_gallery-img8" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="4" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_2_36_gallery-img11" data-ll-trigger="2021_2_36_gallery-img11" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="5" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_2_36_gallery-bottom ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2021_2_36_gallery-bottom" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="6" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_11697 " id="stacks_in_11697" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="2021_2_36_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_11697"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2021_2_36_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_2_36_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2021_2_36_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/li&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;li style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_label"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span class="accordion_icon"&gt;&lt;i class="arrow_icon fa fa-chevron-right"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span style="color:#000000;"&gt;Jim Nelson&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_content" style="display: none; overflow: visible; height: auto;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8650" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8650" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8654" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8654" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-left foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-8654.jpg" alt="Jim Nelson falconry hoodmaker" draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8712" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8712" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>A Northwest falconer, Nelson spent several years as a schoolteacher in rural Alaska. Jim was instrumental in identifying the &lt;em&gt;l’Alethe&lt;/em&gt;, a mystery bird used in 17th Century European partridge hawking, as the Aplomado Falcon, imported from the New World. Nelson developed a new "darted" pattern allowing construction of a seeming Dutch-style shaped hood without the use of blocks over which to mold them. He is the author of the book &lt;em&gt;Hoods, Hooding, and Hoodmaking&lt;/em&gt; (2016).</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_7094" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_7094" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryGrid_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="foundry_blocks_grid block-grid-xs-2 block-grid-sm-2 block-grid-md-3 block-grid-lg-4"&gt;</p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_12801"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2002_47_1_gallery"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2002_47_1_gallery-img1 ll-first" data-ll-trigger="2002_47_1_gallery-img1" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2002_47_1_gallery-img4" data-ll-trigger="2002_47_1_gallery-img4" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="2" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2002_47_1_gallery-img6" data-ll-trigger="2002_47_1_gallery-img6" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="3" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2002_47_1_gallery-img8" data-ll-trigger="2002_47_1_gallery-img8" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="4" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2002_47_1_gallery-img11" data-ll-trigger="2002_47_1_gallery-img11" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="5" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2002_47_1_gallery-bottom ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2002_47_1_gallery-bottom" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="6" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_12815 " id="stacks_in_12815" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="2002_47_1_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_12815"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2002_47_1_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2002_47_1_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2002_47_1_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/li&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;li style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_label"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span class="accordion_icon"&gt;&lt;i class="arrow_icon fa fa-chevron-right"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span style="color:#000000;"&gt;Ron Rollins&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_content" style="display: none; overflow: visible; height: auto;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8656" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8656" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8660" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8660" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-left foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-8660.jpg" alt="Ron Rollins falconry hoodmaker" draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8657" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8657" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Ron Rollins made fine Dutch-style hoods and blocks for many years. He was initially influenced by falconer-hoodmaker Mike Bradford. In the 1990’s Rollins produced a video on hoodmaking that made a major impact on a new generation of hood-makers, by revealing nuanced techniques and adding encouragement. Previously, awling techniques and the finer points of cross-stitching remained a secret to many would-be hoodmakers.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_7117" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_7117" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryGrid_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="foundry_blocks_grid block-grid-xs-2 block-grid-sm-2 block-grid-md-3 block-grid-lg-4"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div&gt;</p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_11821"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2017_27_1_gallery"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2017_27_1_gallery-img1 ll-first" data-ll-trigger="2017_27_1_gallery-img1" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2017_27_1_gallery-img4" data-ll-trigger="2017_27_1_gallery-img4" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="2" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2017_27_1_gallery-img6" data-ll-trigger="2017_27_1_gallery-img6" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="3" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2017_27_1_gallery-img8" data-ll-trigger="2017_27_1_gallery-img8" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="4" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2017_27_1_gallery-img11" data-ll-trigger="2017_27_1_gallery-img11" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="5" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2017_27_1_gallery-bottom ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2017_27_1_gallery-bottom" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="6" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_11833 " id="stacks_in_11833" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="2017_27_1_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_11833"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2017_27_1_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2017_27_1_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2017_27_1_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/li&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;li style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_label"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span class="accordion_icon"&gt;&lt;i class="arrow_icon fa fa-chevron-right"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span style="color:#000000;"&gt;Clayton Smith&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_content" style="display: none; overflow: visible; height: auto;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8662" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8662" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8666" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8666" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-left foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-8666.jpg" alt="Clayton Smith falconry hoodmaker" draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8663" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8663" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Named as a primary inspiration by many contemporary hoodmakers, Clayton Smith set an exemplary standard by 1980’s and 90’s. Smith modified his forms to include a beak bulge forming a molded beak opening. Compared to many contemporaries, he was able to produce a notably lightweight hood utilizing relatively thin leather and immaculate stitching.<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>He formed sleek, finely made topknots and developed a “posi-lock” brace system that closed with an audible “snap”.<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>Although he left commercial hoodmaking by the 1990’s, many regard Smith as one of the top hoodmakers in America.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_7140" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_7140" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryGrid_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="foundry_blocks_grid block-grid-xs-2 block-grid-sm-2 block-grid-md-3 block-grid-lg-4"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div&gt;</p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_11910 " id="stacks_in_11910" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="2000_59_19_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_11910"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2000_59_19_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2000_59_19_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2000_59_19_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/li&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;li style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_label"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span class="accordion_icon"&gt;&lt;i class="arrow_icon fa fa-chevron-right"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span style="color:#000000;"&gt;Steve Tait&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_content" style="display: none; overflow: visible; height: auto;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8668" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8668" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8672" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8672" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-left foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-8672.jpg" alt="Steve Tait falconry hoodmaker" draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8669" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8669" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>A Utah falconer, Steven Tait is a multifaceted artist skilled in painting, drawing, sculpture, and taxidermy. Tait emerged as a leading commercial hoodmaker in the 1990’s and his ongoing advancements in blocks (forms) attracted many other hood-makers who have since adopted his blocks. Tait used raptor skulls in the process of developing his new “beak blocks” and experimented with 3D scanning technology and CNC machining to further refine and reproduce them for the commercial market. Tait has produced an in-depth video on hoodmaking available through many falconry vendors.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_7186" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_7186" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryGrid_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="foundry_blocks_grid block-grid-xs-2 block-grid-sm-2 block-grid-md-3 block-grid-lg-4"&gt;</p>

<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-center foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>

<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>

&lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2018_6_6_gallery"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2018_6_6_gallery-img1 ll-first" data-ll-trigger="2018_6_6_gallery-img1" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2018_6_6_gallery-img4" data-ll-trigger="2018_6_6_gallery-img4" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="2" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2018_6_6_gallery-img6" data-ll-trigger="2018_6_6_gallery-img6" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="3" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2018_6_6_gallery-img8" data-ll-trigger="2018_6_6_gallery-img8" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="4" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2018_6_6_gallery-img11" data-ll-trigger="2018_6_6_gallery-img11" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="5" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2018_6_6_gallery-bottom ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2018_6_6_gallery-bottom" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="6" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_12036 " id="stacks_in_12036" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="2018_6_6_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_12036"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2018_6_6_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2018_6_6_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2018_6_6_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/li&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;li style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_label"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span class="accordion_icon"&gt;&lt;i class="arrow_icon fa fa-chevron-right"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Art Tawatari</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_content" style="display: none; overflow: visible; height: auto;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8674" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8674" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8678" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8678" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-left foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-8678.jpg" alt="Art Tawatari falconry hoodmaker" draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8675" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8675" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Art was raised in southern California and following college became a dentist and settled in the Chico area where he primarily hawks pheasants with peregrines. He is notable for his willingness to share hoodmaking techniques and information to aspiring amateurs, and was influenced himself by Bob McCallum, Jack Stoddart, John Moran, and Clayton Smith. His hoods are known for their extremely tight, perfect stitching, closed seams, and close attention to the beak opening shape. His skill with dental materials and related hand tools no doubt contributed to his execution of fine detail work and ability to mold and pour his own blocks. Tawatari was an early innovator with varied synthetic materials for braces, adopting solutions that retained their integrity and closing resistance for the life of the hood.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>

<p class="p2"><br></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_12620" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_12620" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-center foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>

&lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2021_20_1_gallery"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_20_1_gallery-img1 ll-first" data-ll-trigger="2021_20_1_gallery-img1" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_20_1_gallery-img4" data-ll-trigger="2021_20_1_gallery-img4" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="2" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_20_1_gallery-img6" data-ll-trigger="2021_20_1_gallery-img6" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="3" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_20_1_gallery-img8" data-ll-trigger="2021_20_1_gallery-img8" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="4" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_20_1_gallery-img11" data-ll-trigger="2021_20_1_gallery-img11" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="5" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_20_1_gallery-bottom ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2021_20_1_gallery-bottom" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="6" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_12740 " id="stacks_in_12740" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="2021_20_1_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_12740"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2021_20_1_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2021_20_1_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2021_20_1_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/li&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;li style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_label"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span class="accordion_icon"&gt;&lt;i class="arrow_icon fa fa-chevron-right"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;span style="color:#000000;"&gt;Pete Watzke&lt;/span&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="accordion_content" style="display: none; overflow: visible; height: auto;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8680" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8680" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack"&gt;</p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_8684" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8684" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="text-xs-left foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;</p>
