<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img src="files/image_stack_img-8684.jpg" alt="Pete Watzke falconry hoodmaker" draggable="false" class="img-fluid"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_8681" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_8681" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Originally a California falconer, the late Pete Watzke relocated to eastern Idaho where he primarily flew jack merlins. Pete was widely acclaimed for his merlin hoods despite extreme arthritis in his hands. Watzke was able to achieve a very lightweight, yet finely made merlin hood, with awe-inspiring stitching, that was also durable.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_7209" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_7209" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryGrid_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="foundry_blocks_grid block-grid-xs-2 block-grid-sm-2 block-grid-md-3 block-grid-lg-4"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div&gt;</p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_12163 " id="stacks_in_12163" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="2010_83_2_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_12163"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2010_83_2_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2010_83_2_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2010_83_2_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_12116 " id="stacks_in_12116" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="2010_83_9_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_12116"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2010_83_9_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2010_83_9_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2010_83_9_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>

<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>

<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/ul&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;!-- CONTENT --&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="5__modern_masters__2000_s___present_6" class="glide-section foundry-gn" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_6254" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_6254" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryHeader_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="text-xs-center"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;h2 class="white<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>foundry-typeface-fourteen"&gt;5. Modern Masters: 2000’s – Present&lt;/h2&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_6258" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_6258" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style lead theme_style lead text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Through trial and error, innovation, and exchange, the “American Hood” evolved into a lightweight, durable, especially well-fitting molded hood, with an appropriately contoured beak opening, exemplifying a level perfection that seemed impossible to improve upon. Yet a new legion of both American and international hoodmakers have embraced much of these accomplishments and continue to rise on the ladder of success forged by their predecessors. With no traditions to restrain them, a new global community is still perfecting the “American Hood”.</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_9506" class="stacks_out" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_9506" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryContainer_stack" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="container"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_9508" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_9508" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryHeader_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="text-xs-center"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;h6 class="theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>foundry-typeface-fourteen"&gt;A Selection of Contemporary Hoods&lt;/h6&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>

<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_12363 " id="stacks_in_12363" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="2012_45_1_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_12363"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2012_45_1_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2012_45_1_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2012_45_1_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_12332 " id="stacks_in_12332" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="2016_37_1_gallery" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="full-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>allow-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="200"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">       </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-converted-space">      </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-converted-space">      </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-converted-space">      </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-converted-space">      </span></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-converted-space">      </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_12332"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2016_37_1_gallery"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2016_37_1_gallery-img1 ll-first" data-ll-trigger="2016_37_1_gallery-img1" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2016_37_1_gallery-img4" data-ll-trigger="2016_37_1_gallery-img4" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="2" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2016_37_1_gallery-img6" data-ll-trigger="2016_37_1_gallery-img6" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="3" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2016_37_1_gallery-img8" data-ll-trigger="2016_37_1_gallery-img8" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="4" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2016_37_1_gallery-img11" data-ll-trigger="2016_37_1_gallery-img11" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="5" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2016_37_1_gallery-bottom ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2016_37_1_gallery-bottom" data-ll-name="My Image" data-ll-order="6" data-ll-total="6"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="spl-lightbox lightbox-bg bg-vault bg-color style-pro-stacks_in_12342 " id="stacks_in_12342" data-spl-target="body" data-target-id="sectionsPro1" data-closepos="icon-br" data-closesvg="close-cross" data-ll-id="2016_37_1_spin" data-overlayclose="allow" data-escclose="allow" data-loadtext="Loading..." data-targetsize="size-float" data-hostcontent="hide-host-content" data-scrollto="false" data-scrolloffset="90" data-options="maxw-frame<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>size-float<span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>cross-inside<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>close-on-hover <span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>no-nav<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>loop<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>" data-delay="1000" data-trans="600"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">   </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span>&lt;div class="infix-close lb-close-master close-cross icon-br" id="close_stacks_in_12342"&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;div class="close-wrap" data-infix-close=""&gt; &lt;svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 100 100" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xml:space="preserve" style="fill-rule:evenodd;clip-rule:evenodd;stroke-linecap:round;stroke-linejoin:round;stroke-miterlimit:1.5;"&gt;&lt;circle class="bg" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;circle class="ring" cx="49.5" cy="50.75" r="46.25" style="fill:none;"&gt;&lt;/circle&gt;&lt;g class="action-icon"&gt;&lt;g id="cross"&gt;&lt;path d="M27.347,28.597l44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M71.653,28.597l-44.306,44.306"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="smallcross"&gt;&lt;path d="M33.673,34.923l31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M65.327,34.923l-31.654,31.654"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="arrow"&gt;&lt;path d="M77.25,51.75l-55.5,-0.97l27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M49.373,23.097l-27.623,27.623"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;g id="burger"&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,69.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,50.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;path d="M22.837,31.75l53.326,0"&gt;&lt;/path&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/g&gt;&lt;/svg&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class="spl-instances" data-ll-id="2016_37_1_spin"&gt;&lt;div class="lightbox-info 2016_37_1_spin ll-first ll-last" data-ll-trigger="2016_37_1_spin" data-ll-name="My Limelight" data-ll-order="1" data-ll-total="1"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space">     </span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_9582" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_9582" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style lead theme_style lead text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;em&gt;Note: Due to the limitations of space, and the hoods available in our scanned collection (at the time of this exhibit), we were not able to highlight the work of many gifted hoodmakers. We regret the current omission of many talented hoodmakers. The Archives of Falconry has a collection of over 800 hoods, however we have few examples of hoods made in the last decade, and/or examples from hoodmakers who emerged recently. Please consider donating hoods of contemporary makers worldwide, and we will update the final chapter of this exhibit!<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>&lt;/em&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_12429" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_12429" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;em&gt;If you would like to donate hoods from your collection, send the hood or hoods along with information on the maker, style, size, and materials to : &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;<span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>The Archives of Falconry&lt;br&gt;<span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>5668 W Flying Hawk Ln&lt;br&gt;<span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Boise, ID 83709. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;Have questions? Reach out to us at &lt;/em&gt;&lt;em&gt;&lt;a href="mailto:info@falconry.org"&gt;info@falconry.org&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/em&gt;&lt;em&gt;.&lt;/em&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;!-- CONTENT --&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="about_this_exhibit_7" class="glide-section foundry-gn" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-converted-space">    </span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_6442" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_6442" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryHeader_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="text-xs-center"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;h2 class="white<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>foundry-typeface-fourteen"&gt;About this Exhibit&lt;/h2&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_6445" class="stacks_out" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_6445" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryFloat_stack" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="float-stack" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_12850" class="" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_12850" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryReveal_stack" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="stacks_in_12850_foundry_reveal fadeIn" data-wow-duration="1000ms" data-wow-offset="100" data-wow-delay="500ms" style="overflow: visible; visibility: hidden; animation-duration: 1000ms; animation-delay: 500ms; animation-name: none;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div id="stacks_out_12786" class="" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_12786" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryZoom_stack" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="text-xs-center" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="zoom-wrap" style="overflow: visible;"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;img class="zoom-image img-rounded" src="files/zoom_image-12786.jpg" data-action="zoom" alt="Showing the digitization process"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;div class="icon-indicator"&gt;&lt;i class="fa fa-search"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div id="stacks_out_6446" class=""&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_6446" class="com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style lead theme_style lead text-xs-left foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>We encourage all falconers and interested parties to visit our facility in Boise and see these and many other hoods for themselves alongside thousands of other objects in our large collection. That said, we know that most people around the world will not be able to travel to Boise. Making our entire collection more accessible to a global audience is the primary motivation behind our new digitization effort.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;Our digitization initiative will allow people to view all of our collection records and see photos of all of our artifacts. However, for the most special of objects, we wanted to find a digitization technology that generated an experience as close as possible to holding the object in your hand. We settled on 360° photography, and we thought a virtual exhibit on falconry hoods was a great way to introduce this technology. Each of our hoods is placed into our studio box where it is rotated and photographed 48 times by each of two cameras. The images are then stitched together on the computer, resulting in the high-resolution interactive elements you see throughout this exhibit. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;You can learn more about our digitization process in episode one of our &lt;a href="../../video_series_backup/" title="Video Series"&gt;Ask the Curator video series&lt;/a&gt;. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;These scans allow us to tell a story with our hoods. This narrative about the evolution of the American Hood is just one of the many stories we plan to share from our collection. As we digitize more content, we’ll deliver more stories and an experience that is the next best thing to being here yourself. If you enjoyed the exhibit, we hope you’ll share it with your friends using the share links below. And feel free to let us know what you think at &lt;a href="mailto:info@falconry.org"&gt;info@falconry.org&lt;/a&gt;. What exhibits do you want us to develop? What are you most excited for us to scan?<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clearer"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_9342" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_9342" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryDivider_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;hr class="m-y-md foundry-divider-simple"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_9334" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_9334" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryHeader_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="text-xs-center"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;h6 class="theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;Exhibit Curators&lt;/h6&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_9336" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_9336" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-center foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Kent Carnie, Curator Emeritus, The Archives of Falconry&lt;br&gt;John M. Goodell, Executive Director / Curator, The Archives of Falconry &lt;br&gt;James W. Nelson, Author of: &lt;em&gt;Hoods, Hooding and Hoodmaking&lt;/em&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/p&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_9338" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_9338" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryHeader_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;div class="text-xs-center"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;h6 class="theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;Exhibit Designer and Multimedia Producer&lt;/h6&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;</p>
<p class="p1">&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_9340" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_9340" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryParagraph_stack"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1">&lt;p class="foundry-paragraph-override theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>theme_style<span class="Apple-converted-space">  </span>text-xs-center foundry-typeface-fifteen"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>Marc Dantzker, RangeWide Productions</p>

<p class="p1">&lt;div class="clean-menu-logo"&gt;&lt;div class="cm-logo-wrap"&gt;&lt;div class="cm-logo-left"&gt;&lt;a href="../../virtual_exhibits/falconry_timeline/" title="Home"&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_out_12880_63" class="stacks_out"&gt;&lt;a href="../../virtual_exhibits/falconry_timeline/" title="Home"&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;div id="stacks_in_12880_63" class="stacks_in com_elixir_stacks_foundryImage_stack"&gt;&lt;a href="../../virtual_exhibits/falconry_timeline/" title="Home"&gt;</p>
<p class="p2"><br></p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/a&gt;&lt;div class="text-xs-left foundry-image-wrapper"&gt;&lt;a href="../../virtual_exhibits/falconry_timeline/" title="Home"&gt;</p>
<p class="p1"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span>&lt;/a&gt;&lt;a href="https://falconry.org" rel="" target="" onclick="" id="" class=""&gt;<span class="Apple-converted-space"> </span></p>

<p class="p2"><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span><span class="Apple-tab-span">	</span></p>
